info.title: Vara onboard APIs
info.description: REST API connecting Vara and Polkadot Blockchain to an AI system for processing and displaying on chain data. https://polkai-api.vercel.app/

get.description: Retrieve the balance of an account on a given chain.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Set the Vara blockchain public key/address. Allowed is a string which starts with a 'kG' prefix followed by exactly 47 alphanumeric characters

parameters.name: network
parameters.description: Set the Vara network to use: main or test
